name: RetroTime Playdate
description:
A playdate game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes (port of my SDL2 version)

The games can be played in 3 game modes:
In Retro Carousel mode you will play all games for 2 minutes after each other. You can not die by losing lives. Points will be deducted from the score when dying. The aim is to get the highest score, accumulated over all the games.

In Lives mode you play a single game and start with a fixed amount of lives. Dying will lose you one live. The game is over if the lives reaches 0. The aim of the game is to get the highest score possible without dying.

In Time Attack mode you play a single game for 5 minutes. You can not die by losing lives. Points will be deducted from the score when dying. The aim is to get the highest score during these 5 minutes of playing.

There are 8 retro based games implemented in this game
Invaders is a game based on Space Invaders (Arcade). Rows of enemies are closing in you. You have to shoot them down before they reach your mining asteroids. Shooting down enemies gains points, shooting down all enemies gains extra points. You can move with dpad and shoot with (A). If enemies reach your mining asteroids you will lose a life. Avoid being shot or you will also lose a life.

Brick Breaker is a game based on Breakout (Arcade). Rows of blocks have to be destroyed by touching them with the ball. You control the paddle at the bottom of the screen with the dpad. Keeping (A) pressed speeds up the paddle. You have to let the ball bounce of your paddle to send it back in the playfield. Destroying blocks gains points. Fail to bounce back the ball and you lose a life.

Toady is a game based on Frogger (Arcade). You control the pet by the dpad and you have to keep moving up. Each time you move up to a place you had not reached yet, you will gain points. Avoid getting hit by traffic, don't fall into water, don't exceed the edges of the playfield or you will lose a life. Collect different fruit to gain extra score.

Snakey is a game based on well snake (Nokia 3310). You control a snake's head (red block) by the dpad. The snake can move in four directions and wants food (green blocks). Each time you eat food the snake's body will grow. Eat food to gain points, the longer your snake is to more points you will gain. Touching the snake's body or going outside the playfield will lose you a life.

Bubble Buster is a game based on Pang (Arcade). You control a player that needs to pop bubbles. You can control the player using the dpad and shoot at bubbles using (A) button. If you hit a bubble it will split up into smaller bubbles and you gain points. Get hit by a bubble and you will lose a life, making you temporary invincible but you can not shoot during this time. Clearing all bubbles gives you extra points.

Block Stacker is a game of tetris. You control the blocks with the dpad. You need to stack them in such a manner that they form complete rows. Once this is done that row will be removed. Speed increases gradually and having no place at the top to place a block will lose you a life. You can rotate blocks using (A).

Color Invasion is a game based on Ram-It (Atari 2600). You control the cannon with the dpad. You need to shoot the invading colored bars completely of the screen using (A). Points are awarded when the color bar is completely of the screen, the closer a bar had gotten to the cannon the more points you will gain. You also gain extra points for clearing all bars from the screen. When a colored bar reaches the cannon rail you will lose a life.

Faster Dave is a game based on Fast Eddie (Atari 2600). You control Dave with the dpad. You need to avoid or jump over enemies with the (A) button while collecting the magic balls. When you collect 9 balls the end level key is reachable. You are safe on ladders. Points are received for collecting magic balls and getting the end level key. Collecting the 10th magic ball is not required. When you touch an enemy you will a lose life. Every 5 levels, level layout changes.

description: Strap on the mighty F-16C Viper and enter the world of the Wild Weasels! First In - Weasels Over Syria will immerse you in this legendary mission as you fly head on into the enemies air defenses.

name: Paranormal Files: Trials of Worth - Collector's Edition
description: Paranormal detective Rick Rogers is on the case after two archeologists from the same expedition are found catatonic, but the real mystery has only begun!

name: Ride 5: Short Track Pack
description: Whether on a supermotard or a scooter, push your drifts to the max on the perfect bike with Ride 5: Short Track Pack!

name: Way of the Hunter: Steyr Arms Pack
description: The Steyr Arms pack includes 4 new hunting rifles: Steyr SSG-M1, intended for mid-size big game. Steyr Mannlicher CL II Fullstock. Steyr Monobloc ARMAD, made from high-grade ARMAD steel. Steyr-Gams, the ideal rifle for high alpine hunting, based on the proven Ultra-Light rifle.

name: Airport CEO: Helicopters
description: Lift your airport to a new standard with helicopters!

name: Arcade Archives: Blandia
description: Set out on a war between the king and the world's mightiest warriors.

name: Dread Delusion: Rise of the Skeletons
description: A new update has been brewed for this especially wicked season. A new isle has appeared! Are you ready to explore and uncover its secrets? We've also added a bevy of combat tweaks, sound, and other general adjustments.

name: Super Rare Mixtape: Horror Edition
description: After lying dormant for a while, the Super Rare Mixtape is back! The curator of the Mixtape, Ryan Brown, has once again carefully collated a collection of 30 games and 8 game demos from small developers in the grassroots indie game scene onto a single USB drive, playable on your Windows PC. And this time, they‚Äôre all horror-themed!

name: Vampire Survivors: Whiteout
description: The 1.7.0 patch for Vampire Survivors brings a new snow-inspired special stage, Whiteout, 2 new weapons, 1 new character and 2 new relics, with new achievements about the new content.

name: SuiCats
description: SuiCats is an engaging puzzle game where you combine kittens to create amazing cat cascades. Diverse physics and a humorous design will keep you smiling while playing SuiCats. Join the feline adventure and break the high score today!

name: Deceive Inc.: Of Queens and Kings
description:
New Agent, Octo: meet the boisterous super-hacker, Octo!
New Private Lobbies: Players now have the ability to facilitate their own private matches!
Catalogs from Seasons 1 & 2 will remain permanently completable!
New Map, Operation Sound Eclipse: Stop a powerful EMP super-weapon on a high stakes mission in a futuristic space opera
New Store Items & Premium Catalog Available: New legendary skins, poses, and inks for gadgets and weapons
Quality of Life Improvements: Additional improvements have been made based on community feedback

name: Hell Let Loose: Luftwaffe Eagles
description: Add a new dimension to the battlefield with the Luftwaffe Eagles DLC. As part of the German Luftwaffe forces, the Fallschirmj√§ger were the first paratroopers to feature in large scale airborne based operations.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Just a Scratch Pack
description: OK, maybe these cars have seen better days‚Ä¶ but what they don't give you in design and aesthetics, it's balanced out with performance that will crush your opponents! Add Speed Bump and Sudden Stop to your collection with the exclusive Just a Scratch Pack!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - AcceleRacers All-Star Pack
description: AcceleRacers fans please welcome 4 super stars! The futuristic Carbide, the 4-wheeled nightmare RD-09, the high-speed SUV Rollin' Thunder and the hybrid racing car SpecTyte. Add the AcceleRacers All-Star Pack to your collection now!

name: Revenge of Banana
description: Revenge of Banana is a fast paced FPS game, one damage and you're dead! You have to kill the enemy with your swift moves, dodge a Strawberry trying to hit you, a Watermelon throwing seeds at you and an Exploding Tomato!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Widow's Walkabout
description: Widow's Walkabout is the decaying, Victorian manor on the cliff that you've been waiting to sneak into‚Äîwith haunted mini golf, eerie surprises, and hints to a secret story around every shadowy corner! Putt your way through mesmerizing mechanics and unending curiosities‚Ä¶ if you dare!

name: Super Ultimate Fighters
description: The ultimate fighting game that brings together various fighters!

name: Hentai Tales Vol. 1
description: Immerse yourself in fascinating tales, solve intriguing puzzles and enjoy the beauty of anime images.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Twin Mill (Unleashed Edition)
description: An icon of style and creativity. We're talking about Twin Mill, the legendary Hot Wheels twin-engine racing car, even cooler with the exclusive ‚ÄúUnleashed‚Äú livery. Your collection can't miss this beauty!

name: Halloween Games for Toddlers and Babies
description:
This is a funny Halloween educational game for children. Hold the diapers ready.
The game features different kind of learning peg puzzles, where kids can learn about shapes, form, sizes, colors and they can collect stars to unlock an additional find the pairs memo game, where they can play against a virtual animal cat opponent. All games feature safe for children exclusive funny Halloween illustrations, animations and sounds.

name: Hexillume
description: Connect the hexagons to light them up. Experience beautiful colour themes in every level. Discover new hexagon types as you progress.

name: Mafia Chess
description: Enter the mafia underworld of 2D Chess, where animals take on the roles of mob bosses. Play 10+0 minute games online on the Lichess server. Analyze your moves with Stockfish. Checkmate with style in this captivating cartel-themed chess adventure!

name: Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch
description: Crunch your way around fun, colourful worlds in "Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch"!

name: Parkour Game 2
description: Parkour Game 2 is a 3D first person platform game where you have to jump your way to the finish line.

name: Pellet Packer: Micro Munch
description: Chomp your way up the ranks in "Pellet Packer: Micro Munch"! A chaotic strategy survival game where everything- including your own control method- is your enemy.

name: Primit Shooter 2
description: Primit Shooter 2 is a roguelike shooter set in a universe where cute but dangerous aliens spawn from the Eye Tower. Players must develop their character, pick suitable weapons, and brave through consecutive waves of alien challenges, combining action and strategy for a thrilling experience.

name: Road Rampage
description: Avoid all the cars and try not to crash in this fast paced endless highway game!

name: The No-Name Project
description: Welcome to 'The No-Name Project,' where limitless freedom awaits! Adopt various characters, from animals to NPCs, even resurrecting them with necromancy. Explore, mine, and interact with the world's secrets. Frequent updates ensure endless adventures!

name: Forest Offroad Driving Simulator
description: Discover the beauties of nature with the Forest Offroad Driving Simulator! Customize your vehicle, conquer challenging roads, and get ready for adventure.

name: John Novak
description: Retro Action Platformer with great story and Realistic world. Hand-to-Hand fight, using enviromental elements. Are You a real-life hero John?

name: Kids Land
description: Educational or casual puzzle games for children and adults

name: Witches' Hallow
description: Witches' Hallow is a top-down arena game where you fight against hordes of creatures as a witch who can use up to 5 weapons. Choose one of the witches, develop her as you wish and explore 3 different spooky areas! Don't forget to stay alive while doing this!

name: Echoes of Madness
description: With innovative gameplay mechanics in this genre, a story that immerses you in the depths of unimaginable horrors, and an immersive visual and auditory setting, Echoes of Madness represents the revival of this subgenre forgotten through time. Will you be able to survive your shift?

name: Neon City Climbing Simulator
description: Climb tall buildings with Neon City Climbing Simulator! Prepare for an adrenaline-filled adventure with excitement, realistic graphics, and challenging missions.

name: All-Ways Up
description: Dive into a world where the ground betrays and the only way is up. "AllWaysUp" is a thrilling Jump and Run adventure set against a backdrop of mystery: why must humanity constantly ascend? Master your moves, uncover the story, and support our main game's journey with every leap you take.

name: Blob Life
description: This Cute Sidescroller RPG is all about taking care of little aliens called blobs! Give them unique names, check their vitals, build colorful houses, play and feed them with a variety of sweets when you have all the time in the world.

name: Ground Wars KDR
description: Dive headfirst into the classic era of first-person and third person shooters with "Ground Wars KDR Alpha". Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action and diverse arsenal that defined the early days of FPS gaming. Engage in awesome multiplayer mayhem across multiple maps.

name: Animal Hospital
description: Young animal lovers are warmly invited to come and discover the fascinating world of Animal Hospital. Put on your vet gear and get ready to save all the animals coming through the doors of your hospital. Soon you will learn everything there is to know about species from all four corners of the world!

name: Atomic Hazard
description: Atomic Hazard is a action puzle platformer. Take advantage of your environment in physics-based movement and combat.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Ecto Edition
description: This is an asymmetrical game of hide and seek. In true form to IllFonic's past titles, this title is a 4v1 setup where players will either play as part of a team of new Ghostbusters or a singular Ghost.

name: Divinity Hunting
description: A turn-based combat strategy game, looking for the magical skills left by the ancient immortals.

name: Unity of Command II: Kursk
description: It's the summer of 1943, and the Kursk salient marks the westernmost point the Red Army managed to take and hold in the winter campaign. This DLC covers the legendary battle of Kursk from the Soviet side, with a bonus German campaign containing alt-history tracks.

name: Nothing Left: Give Up
description: Legend has it that in the far east, there is a golden tree that produces golden fruits, and there are constantly explorers embarking on this arduous and challenging journey in search of the legendary golden tree. Explorers please be careful of the rough sea, once stepped into will never be recovered

name: Choice Clash: What Would You Rather?
description: Experience a world of choices in this ultimate decision-making game with 300 mind-bending dilemmas. Your path, your destiny awaits! And You What Would You Rather? Be invisible for a day or Be able to fly for a day? Your Choice matter!

name: Vampire's Kiss
description: Unleash your lust and your thirst in a battle for the soul of London! Will passion lead you back to humanity, or will you embrace the night as a vampire?

name: From Light
description: Embark on a journey through a kingdom ravaged by plague, greed and magic. You are the only who can bring about their salvation, and yours also depends on your success in that task!

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Necromancer
description: Sienna‚Äôs Necromancer career is born from a fight with her twin sister, Sofia, granting her new powers and abilities that allow her to command the dead. How, exactly, these powers were obtained by the once Bright Wizard have yet to be revealed.

name: Elon Simulator
description: Elon Simulator is an immersive Trillionaire Simulator with TONS of fun mechanics and activities. As Elon, you can: Smoke Weed (a lot), Print your own Money, Sell Lithium to Earth for billions, make millions while you sleep in real life, Become a Trillionaire, and tons more! Made by one dude.

name: Drum Roll
description: Have you ever wanted to roll an oil drum? Roll the drum as far as you want with Drum Roll!

name: Ekans
description: Experience the classic Snake game with a twist! You're the fruit, and your mission is to escape the snake. Outsmart your opponents, climb the leaderboard, and face the thrilling challenge!

name: Bingo: Pet Rescue
description: Experience the joy of bingo and pet rescue combined! With delightful gameplay, embark on missions to save adorable pets while enjoying your favorite bingo games.

name: Sushi Ben
description: Featuring exciting 3D manga panels, Sushi Ben is a narrative adventure game where you have to save your favorite Sushi restaurant from going out of business by convincing the local town‚Äôs folk to eat there with you.

name: Xaladia: Rise of the Space Pirates X2
description: Upgrade your weapons, control armaments, and annihilate space pirates! Cover the screen with a barrage of support weapons such as missiles, lasers, barriers, and bots! Captivate players with non-scrolling single-screen combat, flashy support attacks with armaments, and beautiful 3D graphics.

name: Sandy's Great Escape
description: Sandy's Great Escape is a pixel art crab puzzle game in which deaths create shells to help you navigate through different obstacles.

name: Snow Wars VR
description: Step into the immersive world of Snow Wars. Gather your friends and prepare for thrilling snowball battles with up to 8 players, where skill and strategy will lead you to victory.

name: Dinosaurs: Mission Dino Camp
description: The schleich DINOSAURS have come to life and need your help! Find and rescue the legendary giant creatures while you an embark on an action-filled adventure deep in the amazon jungle.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Day One Edition
description:
The ultimate racing game is back ‚Äî and more charged up than ever!

Over 130 vehicles, including new types like motorbikes and ATVs, five new environments with racing surfaces impacting vehicle performance and creating more dynamic gameplay, new driving unique strategies as like lateral dashes and jumps to ensure more wild races, a story-driven campaign, and a variety of exciting new game modes.

The multiplayer experience is enriched thanks to the Cross-play feature, online ranking and PC anti-cheat system. And a lot of ways to show off your creativity are available with the renewed track editor and brand-new stickers for unique vehicle liveries.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Pure Fire Edition
description:
Wal-mart Exclusive! Boost your fun with HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Turbocharged - Pure Fire Edition, which contains:
‚Ä¢ Full game
‚Ä¢ Twin MillTM diecast car with an amazing exclusive livery;
‚Ä¢ HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Rust and Fast Pack, which includes two vehicles (Mod Rod and FusionBusta)
‚Ä¢ HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Speed Kings Pack, which includes two vehicles (Impavido 1 and Electro Silhouette)
‚Ä¢ HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Just a Scratch Pack, which includes two vehicles (Speed Bump and Sudden Stop)

name: The 7th Guest VR
description:
Experience the most spine-tingling VR mystery adventure of your life.

The classic game that chilled you to the bone in the 90s has been brought back to life, with cutting-edge VR technology that delivers an atmospheric story like no other.

name: The Sleep Experiment
description: Experience the horrors of one of the most infamous experiments that ever took place. As a test subject in a top-secret Soviet research facility, you must endure days without sleep while facing unimaginable terrors that lurk in the shadow.

name: Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express
description: Step on board the legendary Orient Express and immerse yourself in the most famous detective suit in a race against the clock to unmask the murderer.

name: Mop of the Dead
description: Mop of the Dead is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. Our cleaning competitors are stealing our customers. Well, let's steal their household products. Run, scream and don't get caught by the revengeful janitor with his big mop of death!

name: Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express includes:
- The Game Original Soundtrack
- Detective Avatars (Hercule Poirot & Joanna Locke)
- The Art of: Murder on the Orient Express - HD Digital Artbook
- 3 HD Wallpapers

name: Munchy Mammals
description: A puzzle game where you move herbivores and carnivores on a grid to fulfill multiple animal requirements using moving, biting, eating and more.

name: Behind the Barrier
description: The year is 1440, and you are a priest that was brave enough to travel to the village of Rosenwood to cleanse the evil spirit (demon) that has been lurking there. . .

name: Hero Planter
description: Get your green thumb ready, because this Roguelite farm simulator is like no other! Each dungeon is unique and unpredictable. Master the art of growing plants and defend them against waves of sneaky pests to become the ultimate Hero Planter.

name: Inescapable: No Rules, No Rescue
description: Inescapable is a social thriller set in a tropical island resort: you‚Äôve been kidnapped and forced to participate in a twisted reality TV show with 10 strangers. At the end of their stay, they‚Äôll each receive $500,000... If they survive.

name: Bish Bash Bots
description: Bish Bash Bots is a unique mix of casual tower defense strategy and all-out brawling action. Team up in couch co-op / online play or go it alone and fight to save the world by building upgradable turrets, unlocking gadgets and bashing bots with giant hammers.

name: Folk Hero
description: Folk Hero is an action-slasher with rogue-lite elements set in the world of Slavic fantasy. Explore the ever-changing island, find treasures, combine weapons and artifacts to defeat mythical enemies. Challenge your skills! One life, one attempt.

name: Tales of Mathasia
description: The lands of Mathasia are beginning to be covered in Corruption. An old legend about the Hero that will master the arts of mathematicians and use his power to defeat the Sorcerer. Only this mysterious Hero can fight the Corruption and stop incoming Darkness!

name: Celestial Force: Magical Mayhem
description: Celestial Force: Magical Mayhem is a beat'em up where you are in control of a Magical Girl preventing an alien invasion. Choose your favorite combatent and defeat the invaders with your elemental-adjacent powers and a lot of glitter!

name: Digs
description: Defend your valuable chest in randomly generated maps with various towers, traps and obstacles to modify the path that the enemies must follow in "Digs", the ultimate rogue-like tower defense game. Experience unique mechanics, upgrade your defenses and face off against challenging enemies

name: Soul's Spectrum
description: Immerse yourself in this dark fantasy adventure where death is not the end but an incentive to keep going: several puzzles await you while a unique story will slowly unfold as you explore this mysterious supernatural place.

name: Teleforum
description: Walter Martins is not among us anymore. What happened was broadcast live‚Ä¶ so why can‚Äôt anyone agree on what happened exactly? Investigate Walter‚Äôs mysterious last show. Interview his wife. Inspect his apartment. Find out the truth.

name: The Turgenev Study
description: Harvest DNA and assimilate new samples for your paramountly important research. Your laboratory is located in a warzone, resulting in limited access to energy sources. Your agent can only launch a harvest every 10 seconds. Do your best despite these harsh conditions.

name: Cavern of Dreams
description:
Cavern of Dreams is a mysterious, surreal adventure game inspired by N64 classics.
You play as a young dragon who's just lost all of his unhatched siblings! You have to explore the Cavern of Dreams and the many strange worlds it's connected to, solving puzzles and facing adversity to rescue them...

name: Gargoyles Remastered
description: Gargoyles Remastered is an artfully crafted revival of the 1995 SEGA Genesis classic 16-bit side-scrolling platform adventure. Relive the epic journey of Goliath and the Gargoyles featuring enhanced visuals, animations, and SFX, all inspired by the acclaimed animated series. The world of Gargoyles comes to life with a level of detail that will thrill fans of the animated series and retro gaming enthusiasts alike. Experience classic gameplay that stays authentic to its predecessor while including new features such as achievements, gameplay rewind, and more!

name: AirportSim
description: AirportSim is an Advanced Airport Ground Handling Simulator with true-to-life visuals and operations, licensed planes and vehicles, real airports and live weather conditions. Enjoy the many tasks alone or with friends, making this experience unforgettable.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: West Balkans
description:
Discover, deliver and expand your trucking company to the countries of Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Kosovo, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Serbia, and Slovenia.

From large bustling cities to the countryside filled with beautiful nature, you will be able to explore what the Western Balkans have to offer.

You can look forward to many new things that these countries have to offer. Whether in terms of the industry, nature, landmarks, road networks, or a lot of other exciting content!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge
description: A free-to-play digital collectible card game set in the 41st millennium, Warpforge will bring together all the major factions of the Warhammer 40,000 universe as digital cards for players to collect and do battle with in brutal and fast-paced skirmishes.

name: Grave Knight
description: Under developement, Grave Knight is an interactive RPG adventure inspired by SRD 5.1 ruleset and classical game books, where your decisions weave the fate of the characters and the story. Let the dice forge the fate of your hero and the realm by fighting the Grave knight and his horde.

name: The Gap
description: The Gap is a sci-fi first person narrative exploration thriller. You play as Joshua Hayes, a neuroscientist who's lost it all. Your mysterious ability to explore parallel realities through deja vu seems to be the only way to recover your memories and salvage your life.

name: Unknown Planet
description: An open world survival game. You've crash landed on an alien planet. Build, craft, mine resources, fight the alien lifeforms and survive.

name: Chaos on Wheels
description:
Take a wheel of a heavily armored car of your choice, and drive yourself to victory while shooting and destroying enemy cars, turrets, and hazards in this chaotic vehicular combat experience. Choose a driver, customize your cars, upgrade armor, buy new weapons, and leave nothing but chaos!

Chaos on Wheels: Ultimate & Chaotic vehicular combat experience. Customize your cars, equip armor, buy weapons, unlock new gadgets, upgrade ammo, and fight other cars in a battle of total mayhem. Choose your driver and take a wheel of a heavily armored car. Drive yourself to victory by destroying any enemy that stands in your way. Avoid projectiles, traps, and hazards and bring chaos to anyone who opposes you.
Complete achievements, upgrade cars and make even more chaos.

name: Laika: Aged Through Blood
description: Laika: Aged Through Blood is a western-inspired motorvania set in a post-apocalyptic desert. It is the story about a tribe oppressed by occupant forces, and the personal story of a mother coyote warrior who descends on an endless path of vengeance to take back what her people lost.

name: Hexarchy
description: A fast-paced turn-based 4x strategy game designed for competitive multiplayer. Players take their turns simultaneously and games take less than an hour.

name: Operation Valor
description: Operation Valor is a tactical top-down multiplayer shooter that provides large scale combined-arms combat through base building and teamwork. This game is a cross between action-packed military gameplay and RTS-style mechanics.

name: Endless Dungeon
description: Endless Dungeon is a Rogue-lite Tactical Action game, set in the award-winning Endless universe. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into a long-abandoned space station, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters‚Ä¶ or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

name: World of Horror
description: Experience the quiet terror of this 1-bit love letter to Junji Ito and H.P. Lovecraft. Navigate a hellish roguelite reality with turn-based combat and unforgiving choices. Experiment with your deck of event cards to discover new forms of cosmic horror in every playthrough. The inevitable awaits...

name: Devil Mail
description:
Devil Mail is a short 3D platform adventure created in fancade. You must find a way to access the castle and deliver an important message to the king, a message from a very far away place...
It can be played directly in the fancade app, or from itch.io

This map contains destructable walls, Quake style walk-on lifts, automatic crushing doors, combination lock with multiple codes randomised for each new playthrough and an item vending machine using rockets as currencyÔªø.

description:
Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.

Running an aquarium shop is a real challenge! Clients will entrust you with difficult tasks you have to cope with. In return, a reward awaits you. Intended for business development - buying new fish, exotic plants, a store, or developing skills.

In Deadliest Catch: The Game you will compete in dangerous sea rallies to catch more crabs than you ever thought possible. The task is not simple ‚Äì it is a battle against time, fishing quotas, crab migrations, and most importantly: the sea. Such is your fate on the Alaskan waters!

description: Enlist in the ever-expanding Hell Let Loose experience, bringing you World War II on an epic scale. With battles of 50v50 players and a dynamically shifting front line, this first-person shooter demands teamwork, communication, and strategy, not only to win but to survive!

name: Freddy in Space 3: Chica in Space
description:
Freddy in Space 3: Chica in Space is the 3rd title in the "Freddy in Space" series. The Game Jolt page is fully themed as a game for the upcoming "Five Nights at Freddy's" film but was just another troll by Scott Cawthon that pokes fun at the different parts of the fandom all the way from memes to Rule 34.

Based on the upcoming Five Nights at Freddy's movie, experience the movie's storyline as an interactive adventure. For those who don't want the movie spoiled for them, I would recommend staying away from this game until after next week! MAJOR SPOILERS AHEAD!

name: Shikakukes
description: Puzzle game for Playdate

name: Grill on Wheels
description: Grill on Wheels is an immersive VR cooking experience that takes you on a culinary road trip like no other. Buy your food truck, customize it with the equipment, go shopping, and start the day! The real chaos starts there . Prepare your ingredients during the prep time early in the morning and get ready for the rush hours!

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 8
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki and her husband inviting the boss home for another live cuckolding experience. Will Adam find pleasure in tainting their marital bed with another man?

name: Thetan Rivals
description: Thetan Rivals: Fun Run Party is the ultimate party and fun-filled adventure, perfect for players of all ages. Join the charming Thenions in a vibrant 3D world, where thrilling races and hilarious knockout challenges await you and your friends. Express your unique style with a plethora of cute skins and cosmetics.

name: ATV Offroad Simulator 24
description: Are you ready for the real offroad experience with ATV Offroad Simulator 24? Discover the excitement of ATV riding in an adventure-filled, open world.

name: Hank
description: When an evil teddy bear wields dark magic to corrupt all the other toys in the house, it's up to Hank to defend his home before his family returns.

name: House of Jigsaw: The Greatest Architecture
description: Embark on a mind-bending journey through architectural wonders with the House of Jigsaw: The Greatest Architecture DLC. This expansion pushes the boundaries of puzzle-solving as you navigate intricate environments inspired by some of the world's most iconic buildings.

name: House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Nature
description: Escape into the serene world of natural wonders with the House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Nature DLC. This expansion redefines the boundaries of puzzle-solving.

name: Tsugunohi: A Voice from Yesteryear
description: "Tsugunohi -A Voice from Yesteryear-" is one of the most popular titles in the "Tsugunohi" series. The game features a new route that can only be released after the game is cleared. In this realistic recreation of Japan's old-fashioned countryside, a number of terrifying events attack a young girl.

name: Ukemeowy
description: In the world of Ukemeowy, you play as an ukulele player, you can mix and match chords to your liking and create the tune you like. Enjoy the vast green scenery as you play the ukulele to your heart's content.

name: 3D Puzzle: Building
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Harbor
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: World war zombie
description: WorldWArZombie - another zombie game but with several maps and several fun and devastating accessories, only for real gamers

name: Sliding
description: Sliding is a casual decryption game inspired by 2048 and Sliding Puzzle.

name: Autumn's Bounty
description: Find your friends, save your potluck.

name: Super Mega Awesome Typing
description: Unleash your inner typing maestro in SUPER MEGA AWESOME TYPING! Epic music, neon vibes, achievements! Get ready to tap to the beat and upskill your typing to BEAST MODE. The only limit is yourself!

name: Ridevery
description: In the game you have to become the fastest and most reliable pizza delivery guy, conquering realistic city streets on your high-speed scooter.

name: Captured Nightmare
description: It follows the story of a young man who ends up involved in a dark adventure, where he will seek to unravel his family tree, during his journey he will find more questions than answers. But be careful! You only have one life, if you lose, you start from zero. Do you accept this challenge?

name: Boots and Daggers
description: How much coin can you grab before time runs out?

name: Devil Seeds
description: Explore a ghost island dominated by mystical creatures. This game offers an experience that mixes horror and RPG, allowing you to explore every dark corner, solving puzzles, finding files and meeting strange characters.

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition
description: Unique third-person shooter action game just made comeback to Nintendo Switch. Become Grave, a resurrected gunslinger and ruthless anti-hero, and rain down bullets on your enemies.

name: Castle Master TD
description: Fortify, Strategize, and Conquer in our dynamic tower defense game. As master of your own castle, you‚Äôll build powerful structures, plan strategic defences, and engage in epic battles against relentless enemies. Each choice you make shapes your kingdom‚Äôs destiny.

name: Evocation
description: A dark fantasy JRPG that focusses on equipment-based progression rather than leveling up. Explore, meet people, and simply survive in order to gain what you need to overcome the trials of the Goddess's temple.

name: Siege Showdown
description: "Siege Showdown" is an exciting strategy game that will give you the opportunity to defend a majestic fortress and fight with the troops of your opponents in a battle for power and territory. An exciting fantasy era world awaits you, where magic and powerful warriors merge in one battle.

name: Luna's Adventure: The Overlord
description: A special friend to rescue. A final boss accessible from the start. A whole world to explore until you can defeat him. Risk your life to save the person most important to you in this fantasy adventure RPG in 3D and real-time combat.

name: Spark Mk1
description: Spark MK1 is a fast paced non-stop action game that will challenge your reflexes.

name: GeoHub
description: GeoHub is a free and open source geography guessing game using Google Streetview to place you in a random location and you have to guess where you think you are in the world.

name: Megaquarium: Deep Freeze
description: Unite the deep ocean's abyssal species and polar favourites such as Ad√©lie Penguins and Seals in this two-for-one expansion! Deep Freeze combines complex new care requirements, new decorative options and a 5 level campaign into Megaquarium's most ambitious expansion yet!

name: The Stormy Islands
description: Survive mother nature, prepare for the different seasons protecting yourself from cold, heat, hunger and thirst. Beware of Tornadoes, Storms, Tsunamis and predatory animals, on a variety of islands where each one will have to adapt to its limited resources.

name: Exoprimal: Season 2
description: Season 2 includes a new Survival Pass and runs from October 18th, 2023 to January 17th, 2024.

name: Kaizo Block
description: A tough, 2D, pixel-art platformer. Overcome 8 progressively more difficult Kaizo-style levels, or try and see how fast you can finish an already completed level. On this journey, momentum, jumps, air dashes, and frequent checkpoints are your friend. The world is your enemy.

name: Lair of Torment
description: This is an indie horror game with first-person puzzles. Terror and fear have enveloped the city. The maniac Orun has returned. You sneak into his lair to try and stop him before he goes too far.....

name: Dead Past 8
description: Dead Past 8 - Survive zombies and unravel island mysteries in this 2023 open-world horror. By day, explore, craft and harvest. After the sun dips below the horizon face stronger, cunning undead. Team up, adapt, and confront the nightmarish challenge. Can you survive "Dead Past 8"?

name: Brawlers
description: One of the top Web3 fighting games, developed by Tyranno Studios! A rowdy collision of strategy and suplexes, designed by the Magic: The Gathering mastermind.

name: Quadrilla
description: Quadrilla is about high scores, big combos and simple arcade fun. Dig out and re-arrange blocks, clear lines, carve a path!

name: Dysmantle: Pets & Dungeons
description: Befriend a pet, and together solve the numerous dungeons to discover the secret behind the island. There's a furry friend for everyone!

name: Jack Dragon
description: Jack Dragon is a retro love letter to 80s arcade videogaming. Collect all of the gem pieces to progress to the next level. Avoid touching the nasties. Collect the snowflake power up to freeze enemies in place (you are an ice dragon, after all!). Just jump, hover and collect! Sounds easy, right?

name: Soul of War: Legions
description: "SoulofWar" is a strategy deck-building game with twists. It features 8-player PvP battles where you strategically outplay your opponents. It introduces a fresh auto chess gameplay.

name: Warframe: Abyss of Dagath
description:
Abyss of Dagath adds the quest for the 54th Warframe, Dagath, in a new Naberus-inspired story from the Entrati Grandmother. Dagath‚Äôs appearance and kit bear some resemblance to a certain equine companion you may have met in Duviri ‚Äî and comes with a brand-new blade and whip melee weapon.

This update has some big changes that aim to improve the broader gameplay experience, including a major overhaul of companions and a rework for the aquatic swashbuckler, Hydroid!
Other planned changes include Auto-melee, a focus acquisition rework and the removal of flawed mods and MK-1 Weapons.

More information about Dagath and the full update will be revealed in the September Devstream ahead of Abyss of Dagath's release this October!

name: Turret Rampage
description: Defend humanity from underground monsters as the last standing turret! Force burrowers out of the ground with an artificial earthquake, capture elusive ghosts with silver shackles, and shatter alien bugs into pieces using powerful rockets!

name: Beatmania IIDX 31 Epolis
description: A new arcade rhythm game from Konami.

name: Harem in Another World
description: Save the world. Get the girls!

name: Last Hopeless
description: Killis hundreds of zombie and get new reinforcement items for survivng. choose your best item set and upgrade them to get hidden skill. Last Hopeless is a rogue-like game with a light physics feed back, you can play with gun, hammer, kitchen knife and other hundreds of items to survival longer.

name: Love Is All Around
description: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

name: The Puppeteer
description: In this short yet challenging action-adventure game, traverse various lands seeking to piece together the methods and madness of The Puppeteer. Craft unique potions to contend with hordes of enemies and uncover secrets rewarded by exploration.

name: Makoto Wakaido's Case Files: Trilogy Deluxe
description: A game based on a simple concept: a mystery puzzle you can complete in an hour. Can you solve the cases narrated in this beautiful pixel-art adventure?

name: Hero Survival
description: Hero Survival is an action-roguelite where you have to shoot down hordes of monsters from classic horror movies one by one to please the Mad Time God. Choose from a variety of skills, weapons, and items to create a unique build for every bizarre character.

name: Sea of Survivors
description: In Sea of Survivors, you can sail in any direction but you can never stop moving. Dodge and destroy hordes of pirates and sea monsters to gain experience, level up and upgrade your weapons and abilities. Discover mysterious curses, and unlock unique treasures as you fight for your survival.

name: Leaf Blower Man: This Game Blows!
description: Blow leaves at 6am on a Sunday and earn points by annoying all the neighbors. But beware - unexpected challenges await on your journey to rid the world of leaves!

name: The Jackbox Party Pack 10
description: Become a party legend! The celebrated franchise returns with epic drawing battles in Tee K.O. 2, chaotic type-offs in FixyText, time-travel trivia in Timejinx, hidden identity intrigue in Hypnotorious, and group music-making in Dodo Re Mi.

name: Kingdoms of Ereloth
description: Kingdoms of Ereloth (KoE) is a Survival RPG video game, inspired by a fantastic medieval era where, thanks to its multiplayer system, you can immerse yourself with your friends in a vast world full of adventures. Forge strategic alliances with other factions to strengthen your kingdom and weaken the enemy, thus changing the fate of Ereloth.

name: Meticulous
description: Meticulous is a gamified personal health companion that will help you automate your diet and fitness planning. Define your own measures of success, design a custom program week-by-week to achieve your goals, and become your own personal health scientist!

name: SnowRunner: Season 11 - Lights & Cameras
description:
Season 11 is included in the Year 3 Pass for SnowRunner.

Action! Support the production of an exciting action movie deep in the valleys of Scandinavia and help a ski resort prepare for the next winter season with 2 new trucks across 2 new winter maps.

name: Hellboy: Web of Wyrd
description: Hellboy Web of Wyrd is a roguelite action adventure with an original story created in partnership with Dark Horse Comics and creator Mike Mignola. When an agent goes missing, Hellboy investigates. Prepare for monstrous toe-to-toe brawling

name: Survivorman VR: The Descent
description:
In the immersive environment of Survivorman VR: The Descent, you will navigate dangerous terrain, gather precious resources and solve difficult puzzles. You have a device attached to your wrist, presenting two crucial health metrics: your body temperature and calorie level. Keep these levels up, and you‚Äôll continue to fight through the frost, making progress towards escape. But if they drop below a certain threshold, it could spell disaster, first causing detrimental health effects before you ultimately freeze to death.

To avoid a less-than-ideal fate, Les Stroud will help you with advice and tips on how to best survive in the freezing wild. Tools such as an improvised paddle, snow shoes, and hunting traps to catch game are all based on real-life survival tools. Challenges are based on actual threats experienced by Les Stroud in his 30+ year career of wilderness survival. With skill, creativity, and a little help from Les, you may just make it out alive!

name: SpellBounders 2
description: Conquer the denizens of Diretome Keep with wits, words, and magic in SpellBounders 2, a dark fantasy roguelike word-game.

name: Dreadhunter
description: Plough through hordes of deadly monsters and defeat vicious bosses in an intense fast paced shooter RPG where all items are ‚Äúlegendary‚Äù, levels are ever-changing and combat is razor-sharp.

name: Protocol: Children of War
description: Form your team with up to 2 friends in Task Force Gaming's Protocol: Children of War and enjoy the unique variation for military shooters based on real experience of US Army Soldiers who fought in Afghanistan.

name: DC Dual Force
description: A card game with PVP and PVE competitions based on superheroes and supervillains from the DC Universe.

name: Cube Chaos
description: Cube Chaos is a complex strategy rogue-lite about placing units to create giant armies, factories, combos, or self replicating murder crabs, overwhelming and surviving your opponents. Build and adapt new strategies each run using a ludicrous variety of units, perks and more.

name: Kona II: Brume
description: Northern Qu√©bec, 1970. A bizarre mist ‚Äîthe Brume‚Äî is disconnecting a rural mining village from its quiet reality. Step into the shoes of Detective Carl Faubert as he unfolds the mysteries haunting the region while battling for his own survival.

name: Collision
description: Daniel has grown up in the Thick Oak Forest for years, living with his mother and father. His father, Oliver, was drafted into war four years before the events of Collision. His father disappears just a few hours before coming home. Solve his murder in a beginner friendly, turn based RPG.

name: The Lotus Holidays
description: A stylish single player story-based game, where you win a free weekend at the "Lotus", a luxurious spa resort. But soon, things take a strange and sinister turn.

name: Wyvia
description: Wyvia is an open world 3D action RPG with 8-bit sprites inspired by classic JRPGs of the era. Featuring a class system with over 10 classes to choose from, a robust cross-class skill system, tons of weapon types, many dungeons to explore, and bosses to fight! Also you can ride a Wyvern!

name: The Troop
description: The Troop is a turn-based, platoon-level tactical game set in WW2. From the early hours of D-Day, follow the campaign of the British and Canadian forces as they struggle against their German counterparts in fighting across Normandy and beyond.

name: Pandemic Train
description: In Pandemic Train you are in charge of the crew aboard a train roaming the postapocalyptic wasteland, ravaged by both war and a deadly plague. Your goal is to survive long enough to discover the cure‚Ä¶ or die trying. Humanity‚Äôs fate is in your hands! Start your journey now!

name: Alaskan Road Truckers
description: Brave the challenging conditions of Alaskan life in the definitive trucker simulator. Be the master of your own destiny as you take jobs, transport cargo and experience a sense of freedom on foot and in your cab.

name: Lore Masters: Pathfinder
description: A Pathfinder trivia game drawing from the lore, rules, and mechanics of the Pathfinder Second Edition tabletop roleplaying game.

name: Cats Spotter
description: Welcome to "Cats Spotter"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden cats on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

name: The Walking Dead Match 3 Tales
description:
The Walkers are coming.
Defend against enemy survivor groups and Walkers in this never-ending fight for survival.

description: Comes with the Last Stand Outfit and head gear (includes 6 skin styles). Compatible with most characters.

name: QS Monkey Land: King of Fruits

Merge cute fruits to create bigger ones!
Who can create the giant fruit first?
Challenge now!

name: Killing Floor 2: MG3 Shredder Weapon Bundle

Restore iconic cars from paint to body parts to create the ultimate car. Forza Customs is available now for iOS and Android.

name: Eternity
description: Eternity is a 2D turn-based RPG that immerses players in a world of fantasy and adventure. Heroes and players take turns casting magical abilities to clear rooms of enemies and receive randomly generated loot. Gameplay includes questing via a quest book, climbing the infinitely tall Dark Tower, crafting items and new heroes at the forge, building the strongest team possible with character management, and teaming up with other heroes in co-op multiplayer.

name: Teke Teke: Moonlit Dread
description: After a disturbing online article, you set out for a late-night grocery run, only to find yourself trapped in a convenience store near a desolate train station. Will you outrun the nightmare or seek salvation in the darkness?

name: My Rental Girlfriend Next
description:
As a shy high school student, dating isn‚Äôt exactly your thing. But luckily, you‚Äôve been able to take advantage of a rental girlfriend service to at least enjoy artificial relationships. You seemed quite satisfied with the status quo and are especially fond of a certain girl named Sumire who you‚Äôve taken on many dates.

One day, you happened to witness the Rental Girlfriend championship and are in awe of the beauty of contestants such as Celina. Your brought back out of your trance when a striking girl next to you begins talking to you. Her name is Jerry and she claims she will be the next Rental Girlfriend star.

It seems she thinks that it is some kind of simple modeling contest, so you decide to explain that it‚Äôs much more than that. However, instead of losing interest, you‚Äôve only gotten her more invested and she demands you become her coach to become the next star!

name: Slayaway Camp 2
description:
Remember Skullface, the extremely malicious masked killer from Blue Wizard‚Äôs 2016 cult hit Slayaway Camp? Well, some random campers made the mistake of summoning him from beyond the grave, and now he‚Äôs trapped inside a very familiar-looking streaming service. That means hundreds of potential new victims splattered across classic movie genres. And they‚Äôre not going to decapitate themselves, are they?

Step into Skullface‚Äôs blood-soaked boots or choose from a murderous lineup of horror heavyweights like Gourd Head, the Killer Fridge, and Demon Doll. This gruesomely funny tribute to ‚Äò80s horror invites you to perfect the art of the scare. Maneuver through sliding block logic puzzles, find hiding spots, collect secret bonus machetes and unleash grisly finishers to elevate your kills and escalate your score.

Rack up star ratings to unlock an expanding horror universe packed with new genres, settings, slayers and stunts as you guide Skullface on his murderous media mission!

Embark on an all-new adventure in Wargroove 2, filled with unlikely friendships, unknown adversaries, and ugly revenge plots. Wage war against your foes with a cast of new Commanders and utilise their new tiered ‚Äògroove‚Äô ability system to sway the fight in your favour.

This pack includes 8 exclusive film grains including a black and white noir filter, 8 Kong style variants , an exclusive boss-rush game mode, and a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game

description: To become an expert in monkey business, you first have to go to monkey school, so enroll now at the craziest college the world has ever seen. You can work your way up through the school years by winning wacky mini-games but keep an eye on your classmates ‚Äì students they may be, but when it comes to trouble and tomfoolery, these goofy monkeys are pros!

name: Tekken 6

name: Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny
description:
Experience Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.
The Soulcalibur series is a weapon-based fighting game in which characters wage battle with a variety of unique weapons.
Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny features the original Gauntlet mode, where players go on an adventure with the characters of Soulcalibur while clearing various missions along the way. The missions are a great way to pick up battle knowledge, techniques, and improve your skills while having fun.

name: Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks
description:
Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.
Dare you test your intelligence against a higher power? Featuring nine mind-stretching stages, plus a two player survival mode, 100 additional challenges and a custom-puzzle generator, Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks remains to this day a supreme test of mental and physical agility.

name: Veil of Darkness
description: In a world shrouded in darkness, where the forces of evil hold dominion, one hero must rise to the challenge.Prepare for an epic journey into the heart of darkness with 'Hexen: Veil of Darkness' - a fresh and fiendish hub adventure utilising the power of GZDoom's Hardware mode. In this corner of Cronos, a shadowy sorceress, the notorious and macabre Mistress Nox, has acquired the Chaos Sphere. With its dark power at her disposal, she's been busy building an army of abominations, casting the world into eternal twilight. You are the chosen one, a hero marked by the Gods themselves. Your divine quest? Venture through treacherous swamps, delve deep into haunted forests, explore creepy castles and dungeons, and ultimately unlock the enigmatic portal to the Shadow Realm.

description: Minimalist, hardcore, and challenging game in the avoid-em-up genre with a creepy style that will test your reflexes, timing, and planning! This game is as hard as hell!

name: Maze Quest Master: Gunner
description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master - Gunner.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"
